title: San Francisco/Golden Gate
name: Barney's Gourmet Hamburgers
directions: between Chestnut St and Lombard St
content: Great gourmet burgers here at a very affordable price.  They have a great selection of burgers including some interesting vegetarian options like "tofu burgers," and fyi, all their burgers can be wrapped in lettuce instead of a bun... give it a try!  They also serve salads and sandwiches.
